tool_description: B2BHint is a business tool that provides access to official registry data on companies and the people associated with them. With B2BHint, everyone can easily search and explore information on companies, making informed decisions and growing their business.
name: B2BHint
title: B2BHint

api_list.name: Search person by name
api_list.description: Search for a person by parameters will return a list of persons that match your query

api_list.name: Get company [Full data]
api_list.description: The Get company details endpoint will return all full company data, including company contacts, financial reports and other data

api_list.name: Search company by Name
api_list.description: Search for a company by parameters will return a list of companies that match your query

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: Company name or number or other identifiers

api_list.name: Get company [Basic data]
api_list.description: The Get company details endpoint will return all basic company data on B2BHint.

api_list.name: Search company by Email
api_list.description: Search for a company by email will return a list of companies that match the selected email
